channel.title: Production to execution process (steps)
channel.description:
pretty basic stuff, but i always get confused in the middle parts... so Is this order correct ? (from production[post planning] to executing)
[end user] - java source -> java compiler -> java bytecodes -> bytecode verifier -> jvm -> os ->hardware - [program functionality]
have i missed anything/misplaced anything?
ps. and why is recursion a good way to traverse linked lists? (because linked lists are recursively linked data when singly-linked?) ...(yes im studying for an exam xD)
